events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to return it and get a refund because the item was not as described.
The case has been classified under the refund category based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the recent order.
Could you please provide the order number and explain the reason for the return so we can process your refund faster?
Sure, the order number is 12345678. The product did not match the description on your website, so I want to return it.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately and send you instructions on how to return the item.
Great, thank you for your quick response! I appreciate the help with the refund process.
Your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
We are following up to ensure that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The case has been closed as the refund was successfully issued and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. Your feedback would be greatly appreciated.
